Member Function Documentation

void brics_3d::Octree::filter ( PointCloud3D *  originalPointCloud,
PointCloud3D *  resultPointCloud 
) [virtual]

Reduce the size of a point cloud.

The behavior of the size reduction can be influenced with the parameter voxel size: IOctreeSetup::setVoxelSize()

Parameters:
[in]originalPointCloudThe input point cloud that will be reduced. This data will not be modified.
[out]resultPointCloudThe new point cloud with the reduced amount of points.

Implements brics_3d::IOctreeReductionFilter.

double brics_3d::Octree::getVoxelSize ( ) [virtual]

Get the current size the maximum of the smallest voxel in an Octree.

Returns:
The current size.

Implements brics_3d::IOctreeSetup.

Definition at line 160 of file Octree.cpp.

void brics_3d::Octree::partitionPointCloud ( PointCloud3D *  pointCloud,
std::vector< PointCloud3D * > *  pointCloudCells 
) [virtual]

Partitions a point cloud into sub points clouds.

The behavior of the subdivision can be influenced with the parameter voxel size: IOctreeSetup::setVoxelSize()

Parameters:
[in]pointCloudThe input point cloud that will be partitioned. This data will not be modified.
[out]pointCloudCellsResulting vector of point clouds. Each point cloud represents one cell of the partition.

Implements brics_3d::IOctreePartition.

void brics_3d::Octree::setVoxelSize ( double  voxelSize) [virtual]

Set the size of the maximum of smallest voxel in an Octree.

Parameters:
voxelSizeThe new voxel size. NOTE: the current implementation interprets voxelSize as the from the center to one of the cube faces.

Implements brics_3d::IOctreeSetup.
